name: interview
description: ``` const container = document.createElement('div'); for (let i = 0; i < 10; i++) {   const link = document.createElement('a');   link.href = '#';   link.textContent = i.toString();   link.setAttribute('data-id', i);   container.append(link); } container.addEventListener('click', (event) => {   if (event.target.tagName === 'A') {     event.preventDefault();     window.alert(event.target.dataset.id);   } }); document.body.append(container); ```
